description: This table contains hospital account transaction detail from the Hospital Permanent Transactions (HTR) master file.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account associated with the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: ACCT_CLASS_HA_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds the account class of the account when the transaction filed. This is set for all transaction types.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ACTION_STRING
columns.description: A comma-delimited list of one or more numbers stored in a payment transaction that correspond to actions entered in payment posting. Actions are 1 -- Not Allowed Adjustment, 2 -- Next Responsible Party, 3 -- Claim Denied.

columns.name: ALLOWED_AMOUNT
columns.description: An allowed amount stored in a payment transaction.

columns.name: BILLED_AMOUNT
columns.description: A billed amount stored in a payment transaction.

columns.name: BILLING_PROV_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the billing provider stored in the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the liability bucket on which the transaction is currently active. This field is only populated for payment and adjustment transactions, not charges.

columns.name: COINSURANCE_AMOUNT
columns.description: A coinsurance amount stored in a payment transaction. Coinsurance amounts are informational only.

columns.name: COPAY_AMOUNT
columns.description: A copay amount stored in a payment transaction. Coinsurance amounts are informational only.

columns.name: DEDUCTIBLE_AMOUNT
columns.description: A deductible amount stored in a payment transaction. Coinsurance amounts are informational only.

columns.name: DEPARTMENT
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the department associated with the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: DFLT_FEE_SCHED_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the default fee schedule for the service area with which a charge transaction is associated.

columns.name: DFLT_FEE_SCHED_ID_FEE_SCHEDULE_NAME
columns.description: The name of each fee schedule.

columns.name: DFLT_PROC_DESC
columns.description: This column stores the original description of the procedure stored in the procedure record's Name History (I EAP 6), which appears in Procedure Editor as Name. This item is only populated if the description for the procedure was overridden in charge entry.

columns.name: DFLT_UB_REV_CD_ID
columns.description: The default revenue code from the procedure master file for a charge transaction.

columns.name: DFLT_UB_REV_CD_ID_REVENUE_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the revenue code.

columns.name: FACILITY_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the facility associated with the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: FIN_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the category ID of the financial class stored in a hospital billing transaction. For charges, the financial class comes from the hospital account that the charge is associated with. For payments, the financial class comes from the payer specified during payment posting. If no payer is specified during payment posting, the financial class is self-pay. If the adjustment is entered in adjustment posting, the financial class is from the payer specified in adjustment posting. If the adjustment is created from a bucket action, the financial class comes from the financial class on the bucket. If no payer is specified during adjustment posting or the adjustment bucket action is made on an undistributed bucket, the financial class is self-pay. Adjustment refund bucket actions can specify the payer, in which case the specified payer's financial class is used.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Commercial


Medicare


Medicaid


Self-Pay


Worker's Comp


Tricare


Champva


Group Health Plan


FECA Black Lung


Blue Shield


Medigap


Other


DK Regional


Client

columns.name: INST_BILL_COMMENT
columns.description: A comment stored in a charge transaction. If a hospital account's guarantor is of a type that is considered institutional, then certain pieces of institutional billing-related information can be stored in charges filed on that hospital account.

columns.name: INST_BILL_DOB
columns.description: A date of birth stored in a charge transaction. If a hospital account's guarantor is of a type that is considered institutional, then certain pieces of institutional billing-related information can be stored in charges filed on that hospital account. A date of birth is one such piece of information.

columns.name: INST_BILL_EMP_NUM
columns.description: An employee number stored in a charge transaction. If a hospital account's guarantor is of a type that is considered institutional, then certain pieces of institutional billing-related information can be stored in charges filed on that hospital account. An employee number is one such piece of information.

columns.name: INST_BILL_PAT_NAME
columns.description: A patient name stored in a charge transaction. If a hospital account's guarantor is of a type that is considered institutional, then certain pieces of institutional billing-related information can be stored in charges filed on that hospital account. A patient name is one such piece of information.

columns.name: INST_BILL_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description:
A patient sex stored in a charge transaction. If a hospital account's guarantor is of a type that is considered institutional, then certain pieces of institutional billing-related information can be stored in charges filed on that hospital account. A patient sex is one such piece of information.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Unknown


Nonbinary


X


Other

columns.name: INT_CONTROL_NUMBER
columns.description: The internal control number stored in a payment transaction.

columns.name: IS_SYSTEM_ADJ_YN
columns.description:
Denotes whether an adjustment was posted by the system, as opposed to by a user.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: IS_HOSPITALIST_YN
columns.description:
Denotes whether a charge has a billing provider who is designated in ADT as a hospitalist.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: IS_LATE_CHARGE_YN
columns.description:
Denotes whether a charge is a late charge.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_SYSTEM_ADJ_YN

columns.name: IS_RECOUPMENT_YN
columns.description:
Denotes whether a payment is a recoupment.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_HOSPITALIST_YN

columns.name: MODIFIERS
columns.description: A comma-delimited list of one or more modifiers associated with a charge transaction.

columns.name: OLD_HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account associated with the old hospital billing transaction that was transferred to a different hospital account, causing this new transaction to be created.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the clinical system order that triggered a hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: ORIG_PRICE
columns.description: Denotes the price that was determined for a charge based on fee schedules.

columns.name: ORIG_REPOST_TX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the original transaction of a hospital billing transaction automatically reposted due to a change in financial class, account class, or primary payer.

columns.name: ORIG_REV_TX_ID
columns.description: In a reversal transaction, this column denotes the ID number of the original transaction that was reversed.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: For a charge dropped via ADT's bed charge billing function or a payment collected at the point-of-service, the contact serial number of the patient contact that triggered the bed charge or led to the collection of the payment.

columns.name: PAYMENT_FROM
columns.description: For self pay payments, a text string indicating from whom the payment was received.

columns.name: PAYMENT_SRC_HA_C_NAME
columns.description:
The payment source stored in a payment transaction, i.e. cash, check, or credit card.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Cash


Check


Credit Card


EOB


Voucher


Bank Account


Trust Account

columns.name: PAYOR_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the payer associated with each payment or adjustment. This is not populated for charge transactions or when the payment or adjustment is posted to the self-pay bucket. Payments are assigned to the payer specified in payment posting. Adjustments made using adjustment posting are assigned to the payer specified in adjustment posting. Adjustments made using bucket actions are assigned to the payer on the liability bucket to which the adjustment was posted. Refund bucket actions can override the bucket payer with a user entered payer. Users can override any adjustment's payer in adjustment workqueues. Adjustments posted to the undistributed bucket have no payer unless overridden.

columns.name: PAYOR_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: PERFORMING_PROV_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the performing provider associated with a charge transaction.

columns.name: PREV_CREDITS_ACT
columns.description: For adjustment transactions that move liability from one bucket to another, the total monetary amount of previous credits on the former bucket.

columns.name: PRIM_FEE_SCHED_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the primary fee schedule used to price a charge transaction.

columns.name: PRIM_FEE_SCHED_ID_FEE_SCHEDULE_NAME
columns.description: The name of each fee schedule.

columns.name: PROCEDURE_DESC
columns.description: This column stores the value manually entered for the procedure description at the time of charge entry. If no value was manually entered, then the procedure record's Name History (I EAP 6) is populated here.

columns.name: PROC_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the procedure associated with the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: QUANTITY
columns.description: For charge transactions, the quantity.

columns.name: REFERENCE_NUM
columns.description: The payment posting reference number associated with a transaction.

columns.name: UB_REV_CODE_ID
columns.description: The revenue code associated with a charge transaction. This could come from the procedure master file or from a user-entered override.

columns.name: UB_REV_CODE_ID_REVENUE_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the revenue code.

columns.name: REVENUE_LOC_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the revenue location stored in the hospital billing transaction. It is only set when hospital account identifiers are assigned by location instead of service area.

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the service area associated with the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: SERVICE_DATE
columns.description: The service date of a charge, the deposit date of a payment, or the creation date of an adjustment.

columns.name: START_DATE_TIME
columns.description: For charge transactions that result from timed procedures, the start date and time stored in the transaction.

columns.name: STOP_DATE_TIME
columns.description: For charge transactions that result from timed procedures, the end date and time stored in the transaction.

columns.name: TEMP_TX_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the temporary transaction (HTT record) associated with the transaction in question.

columns.name: TOTAL_CHARGES_ACT
columns.description: For adjustment transactions that move liability from one bucket to another, the total monetary amount of charges on the latter bucket.

columns.name: TX_AMOUNT
columns.description: The monetary amount of a transaction.

columns.name: TX_COMMENT
columns.description: A comment associated with a transaction.

columns.name: TX_FILED_TIME
columns.description: The date and time when a transaction was filed on a hospital account.

columns.name: TX_NUM_IN_HOSPACCT
columns.description: A number denoting in what order the transaction filed on the hospital account. For example, if the transaction in question was the third transaction to file on the account, this column would contain the number 3.

columns.name: TX_POST_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the transaction was posted.

columns.name: TX_SOURCE_HA_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source of the transaction, i.e. unit charge entry, payment posting, electronic remittance,

columns.name: TX_TYPE_HA_C_NAME
columns.description:
The transaction type, i.e. charge, payment, debit adjustment, or credit adjustment.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Charge


Payment


Debit Adjustment


Credit Adjustment

The type of service associated with a transaction.

 Category Entries:

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the user who posted the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: XFER_LIAB_ADJ_YN
columns.description:
Y/N flag denoting if the transaction transfers the liability adjustment.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_SYSTEM_ADJ_YN

columns.name: CHG_CRED_ORIG_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the transaction of a late charge credit.

columns.name: LATE_CRCTN_ORIG_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the original charge for a late charge correction transaction.

columns.name: ALLOWANCE_ADJ_YN
columns.description:
Y/N flag indicating if there is an allowance adjustment.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_SYSTEM_ADJ_YN

columns.name: PLACE_OF_SVC_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the place of service associated with the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: NON_COVERED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the transaction is expected to be a non-covered charge.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_SYSTEM_ADJ_YN

columns.name: BEN_BKT_CVG_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the benefit bucket associated with the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: BEN_BKT_INC_STR
columns.description: The increment string for the benefit bucket associated with the transaction.

columns.name: QUICK_PMT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The quick payment type category ID for the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Copay


Prepayment


Deductible


Coinsurance


Previous Balance

columns.name: NON_COVERED_AMT
columns.description: The non-covered amount associated with the transaction.

columns.name: IS_REFUND_ADJ_YN
columns.description:
Denotes whether this is a Refund Adjustment.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_SYSTEM_ADJ_YN

columns.name: INVOICE_NUM
columns.description: The invoice number for the transaction.

columns.name: COLLECTION_AGENCY
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the collection agency that the hospital billing transaction has been sent to for collections.

columns.name: COLLECTION_AGENCY_COLL_AGENCY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the collection agency.

columns.name: PRIMARY_PLAN_ID
columns.description: Holds the primary plan of the account when the transaction filed. This is set for all transaction types.

columns.name: PRIMARY_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: HCPCS_CODE
columns.description: The override CPTï¿½ or HCPCS code either entered manually during charge entry or coming from the clinical application.  Often, pharmacy and supply charges will have a code sent from the clinical system to override the code stored on the procedure. When reporting, you will often want to display this column if it is populated, otherwise display CPT_CODE.

columns.name: NDC_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the historical National Drug Code for the corresponding charge. This column will only be set for certain charges posted prior to being on the Epic Summer 2009 release. For current NDC code information, use NDC_CODE_RG_ID column in the HSP_TX_NDC_CODES table.

columns.name: NDC_ID_NDC_CODE
columns.description: The external code for the National Drug Code (NDC). An NDC represents packages of medications.

columns.name: HIPPS_CODE
columns.description: HIPPS Code for this transaction.

columns.name: HIPPS_CODE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
HIPPS Code type for this transaction. i.e. 1-Skilled Nursing Facility 2-Home Health PPS 99-other


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Skilled Nursing Facility PPS


Home Health PPS


NY Medicaid EPS


Other

columns.name: HIPPS_CODE_DESC
columns.description: HIPPS Code description for this transaction.

columns.name: RFND_SND_TO_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column specifies where to send the refund should there be a credit balance on the hospital billing transaction: 1-Coverage, 2-Guarantor, 3-Patient, 4-Custom Payee, 5-Address Override, 6-Payor, or 7-Plan.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Coverage


Guarantor


Patient


Custom Payee


Address Override


Payer


Plan


Direct Return

columns.name: RFND_GUAR_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the guarantor associated with the refund code on the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: RFND_COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the coverage associated with the refund code on the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: REFUND_PLAN_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the benefit plan associated with the refund code on the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: REFUND_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: RECONCILIATION_NUM
columns.description: Reconciliation number from a remittance run.

columns.name: RFND_CUST_PAYEE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The custom payee for the refund (no system-released values).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: CE_SRC_DEP_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the source deployment of the transaction. This identifies the location where the hospital billing transaction originated. This will have a value of null unless the transaction's deployment of origination and the home deployment are different.

columns.name: CE_POST_DT
columns.description: The post date for the transaction.  This will have a value of null unless the transaction's deployment of origination and the home deployment are different.

columns.name: CE_FILED_TIME
columns.description: The date and time that the transaction was filed.  This will have a value of null unless the transaction's deployment of origination and the home deployment are different.

columns.name: CE_HM_OFF_TXTYP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of transaction that took place.  This will have a value of null unless the transaction's deployment of origination and the home deployment are different.  Some example values for this field are as follows: 1 - charge, 2 - payment, 3 - debit adjustment, 4 - credit adjustment.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TX_TYPE_HA_C_NAME

columns.name: POS_SESSIONID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the Point of Sale session.

columns.name: POS_TXID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the Point of Sale transaction.

columns.name: POS_TX_LINE
columns.description: The Point of Sale transaction line number.

columns.name: ORIG_ETR_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the Professional Billing transaction that was the transfer source for this Hospital Billing transaction.

columns.name: EXTERN_AR_FLAG_YN
columns.description:
External A/R Flag. This flag determines if an transaction's A/R is to be counted as belonging to an external agency (i.e., as bad debt). This flag is copied from the hospital account level flag. This flag is only used if external agency A/R has been enabled.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active AR


External Agency AR


Bad Debt


Outsourced

columns.name: ERX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the medication record on the hospital billing transaction. This column will have relevant data for any pharmacy charges. It can be used to link to CLARITY_MEDICATION and other pharmacy tables.

columns.name: SUP_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: SUP_ID_SUPPLY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the inventory item.

columns.name: BAD_DEBT_FLAG_YN
columns.description:
Bad Debt Flag. This flag determines if a transaction's amount is to be counted as belonging to a bad debt agency. This flag is copied from the hospital account level flag. This flag is only used if account-based bad debt is used. This flag will be set to 'Y' if the account is in bad debt, 'N' for external AR, or NULL otherwise.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: EXTERN_AR_FLAG_YN

columns.name: PMT_RECEIPT_NO
columns.description: Stores the receipt number for a receipt printed during payment posting.

columns.name: RFND_AP_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date on which the A/P system approved and processed the transaction.

columns.name: RFND_AP_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the action taken by the A/P system when it processed the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Approved


Rejected

columns.name: OPTIME_LOG_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the OpTime log associated with the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: INI_FILE_ATTEMPT_DT
columns.description: Item to represent the date when the first attempt to file the transaction was made.

columns.name: RELATED_HTR_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier of the related hospital billing (HB) transaction for this HB transaction. This will map to a HB transaction that is associated with the related hospital account.

columns.name: IMD_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the image associated with this hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: DURATION_MINUTES
columns.description: This column contains the duration of service in minutes.

columns.name: EB_PMT_HAR_RES_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether hospital account restrictions are used.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_SYSTEM_ADJ_YN

columns.name: PMT_HAR_DIS_FROM_DT
columns.description: The hospital account restriction discharge from date.

columns.name: PMT_HAR_DIS_TO_DT
columns.description: The hospital account restriction discharge to date.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_XOVER_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this payment contained override crossover information.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_HOSPITALIST_YN

columns.name: RESEARCH_STUDY_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the research study or client associated with this hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: RSH_CHG_ORIG_HAR_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the original hospital account for a research charge.

columns.name: PAYMENT_NOT_ALLOWED
columns.description: This column contains the not-allowed amount on the payment transaction.

columns.name: EB_PMT_TOTAL_AMOUNT
columns.description: This column contains the original payment amount. Original payment amount is the amount of the payment prior to getting split in split cases and if the payment is not split, then the original payment amount is the full payment of the transaction.

columns.name: EB_PMT_POST_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type category number of the post type used to post the enterprise payment.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: EB_PREPMT_POST_TP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type category number for the pre-payment post type associated with this transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PANEL_DT
columns.description: The contact date of the panel procedure that is associated with this transaction.

columns.name: MEA_ID_C_NAME
columns.description:
Measurement reference ID code.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Original/Starting dosage


Test Results

columns.name: PANEL_DAT
columns.description: The contact date of the panel procedure that is associated with this transaction, in decimal format. Used to link with the CLARITY_EAP_OT table.

columns.name: ELEC_PMT_APRVL_CODE
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction sent back by the merchant.

columns.name: ELEC_PMT_INST_TIME
columns.description: Instant of when the payment was approved

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the implant record associated with this procedure.

columns.name: LINKED_HTR_ID
columns.description: This item links two hospital billing transactions in the system. These transactions will be reversed and transferred at the same time.
